kirtansohilaEnglish.English: <font color='#009900'>Sohelaa</font> raag gaorhee <font color='#FFA500'>deepkee</font> mehlaa 1
<font color='#FFA500'>ik oNkaar</font> satgur parsaad||
jai ghar keerat <font color='#FFA500'>aakheeai</font> kartay kaa hoay beechaaro||
tit ghar gaavhu <font color='#FFA500'>sohilaa</font> sivrihu sirjanhaaro ||1||
tum <font color='#FFA500'>gaavhu</font> mayray nirbhao kaa sohilaa||
hao <font color='#009900'>vaaree</font> jit <font color='#FFA500'>sohilai</font> sadaa sukh hoay ||1||
rahaao||
nit nit jeearhay <font color='#FFA500'>samaaleean</font> daykhaigaa dayvanhaar||
tayray daanai keemat naa <font color='#FFA500'>pavai</font> tis daatay kavan sumaar ||2||
sambat saahaa <font color='#FFA500'>likhiaa</font> mil kar paavhu tayl||
dayh sajan <font color='#FFA500'>aseesrheeaa</font> jio hovai saahib sio mayl ||3||
ghar ghar ayho <font color='#FFA500'>paahuchaa</font> sadrhay nit pavann||
sadanhaaraa <font color='#FFA500'>simreeai</font> <font color='#009900'>naanak</font> say dih aavann ||4||1||
raag <font color='#009900'>aasaa</font> mehlaa 1||
chhia <font color='#009900'>ghar</font> chhia <font color='#FFA500'>gur</font> chhia updays||
gur gur <font color='#FFA500'>ayko</font> vays anayk ||1||
<font color='#009900'>baabaa</font> jai <font color='#FFA500'>ghar</font> kartay keerat hoay||
so ghar <font color='#FFA500'>raakh</font> vadaaee toay ||1||
rahaao||
visuay chasiaa gharheeaa <font color='#FFA500'>pahraa</font> thitee vaaree maahu hoaa||
sooraj <font color='#FFA500'>ayko</font> rut anayk||
<font color='#009900'>naanak</font> kartay <font color='#FFA500'>kay</font> kaytay vays ||2||2||
raag <font color='#009900'>Dhanaasree</font> mehlaa 1||
gagan mai <font color='#009900'>thaal</font> rav chand deepak <font color='#FFA500'>banay</font> taarikaa <font color='#009900'>mandal</font> janak motee||
Dhoop malaan <font color='#009900'>lo</font> pavan chavro <font color='#FFA500'>karay</font> sagal <font color='#009900'>banraaay</font> foolant jotee ||1||
<font color='#FFA500'>kaisee</font> aartee hoay||
bhav <font color='#FFA500'>khandnaa</font> tayree aartee||
anhataa <font color='#FFA500'>sabad</font> vaajant bhayree ||1||
rahaao||
sahas tav <font color='#009900'>nain</font> nan nain heh tohi <font color='#FFA500'>kao</font> sahas <font color='#009900'>moorat</font> nanaa ayk tohee||
sahas pad <font color='#009900'>bimal</font> nan ayk <font color='#FFA500'>pad</font> ganDh <font color='#009900'>bin</font> sahas tav <font color='#FFA500'>ganDh</font> iv chalat mohee ||2||
sabh meh <font color='#FFA500'>jot</font> jot hai soay||
tis dai <font color='#FFA500'>chaanan</font> sabh meh chaanan hoay||
gur <font color='#FFA500'>saakhee</font> jot pargat hoay||
jo tis <font color='#FFA500'>bhaavai</font> so aartee hoay ||3||
har charan kaval <font color='#009900'>makrand</font> lobhit <font color='#FFA500'>mano</font> <font color='#009900'>andino</font> mohi aahee piaasaa||
kirpaa jal deh naanak saaring <font color='#FFA500'>kao</font> hoay jaa <font color='#009900'>tay</font> tayrai naaay vaasaa ||4||3||
raag gaorhee <font color='#FFA500'>poorbee</font> mehlaa 4||
kaam karoDh nagar baho <font color='#FFA500'>bhariaa</font> mil saaDhoo khandal khanda hay||
poorab likhat <font color='#009900'>likhay</font> gur <font color='#FFA500'>paaiaa</font> man har liv mandal mandaa hay ||1||
kar saaDhoo <font color='#FFA500'>anjulee</font> pun vadaa hay||
kar <font color='#FFA500'>dandut</font> pun vadaa hay ||1||
rahaao||
<font color='#009900'>saakat</font> har ras saad na <font color='#FFA500'>jaaniaa</font> tin antar haumai kandaa hay||
jio jio <font color='#009900'>chaleh</font> chubhai dukh <font color='#FFA500'>paavahi</font> jamkaal saheh sir dandaa hay ||2||
har jan har har naam <font color='#FFA500'>samaanay</font> dukh janam maran bhav khanda hay||
abinaasee purakh paaiaa <font color='#FFA500'>parmaysar</font> baho sobh khand brahmandaa hay ||3||
ham gareeb maskeen parabh <font color='#FFA500'>tayray</font> har raakh raakh vad vadaa hay||
jan <font color='#009900'>naanak</font> naam aDhaar tayk <font color='#FFA500'>hai</font> har naamay hee sukh mandaa hay ||4||4||
raag gaorhee <font color='#FFA500'>poorbee</font> mehlaa 5||
karao baynantee sunhu mayray <font color='#FFA500'>meetaa</font> sant tahal kee baylaa||
eehaa khaat chalhu har <font color='#FFA500'>laahaa</font> aagai basan suhaylaa ||1||
aoDh <font color='#FFA500'>ghatai</font> dinas rainaaray||
<font color='#009900'>man</font> gur <font color='#FFA500'>mil</font> kaaj savaaray ||1||
rahaao||
ih sansaar bikaar sansay <font color='#FFA500'>meh</font> tario barahm giaanee||
jisahi jagaaay peeaavai ih <font color='#FFA500'>ras</font> akath kathaa tin jaanee ||2||
jaa kao aaay soee <font color='#FFA500'>bihaajhahu</font> har gur tay maneh basayraa||
nij ghar <font color='#009900'>mahal</font> paavhu sukh <font color='#FFA500'>sehjay</font> bahur na hoigo fayraa ||3||
<font color='#009900'>antarjaamee</font> purakh <font color='#FFA500'>biDhaatay</font> sarDhaa man kee pooray||
naanak daas ihai sukh <font color='#FFA500'>maagai</font> mokao kar santan kee Dhooray ||4||5||
